Reviews.Title: Its legit
Reviews.Author: Brandon C Ray
Reviews.Content: I didn't think this deal was legit, but it is. This whole package is cheaper than I cold find the T3 anywhere else. It is a new camera too. I was afraid it was refurbished or something, but it isn't.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what you see
Reviews.Author: stanley njigwum
Reviews.Content: I must say that i am highly glad to make purchase of this product, all i need to get kicking as a photographer was included in the box. The multiple charger kit which included a car charger was great and i readily would recommend this for any one opting for the T3i. Thanks

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Terry M. Stephens "tms"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera package everything was as advertised. Amazon as usual always exceeds my expectations. Everything you need to get started is in this package.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.2 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed.
ISO 100 - 6400 for shooting from bright to dim light.
Improved EOS HD Movie mode with expanded recording and with in-camera video editing options.
High speed, reliable 9-point AF system utilizing a high precision, f/5.6 cross-type center point.
Includes EOS Rebel T3 digital SLR camera and EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Type II Lens
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital Camera and 18-55mm IS II Lens Package 4
